ModMetaData.name: Storybook
ModMetaData.author: Krush
ModMetaData.description:
Requires: CommunityCoreLibrary
Adds some more backstories to the game.
Childhood - Bully - Farm Kid - Fat Kid - Medieval Witch - Military Cadet - Miner Kid - Officer Cadet - Pet Sitter - Runaway - Sandbox Architect - Super Hero - Tester - Vatgrown Engineer - Vatgrown Slave - Young Reader
Adulthood - Jack Of All Trades - Junior Officer - Medical Soldier - Mercenary Lieutenant - Military Scout - Musician - Police Officer - Police Sergeant - Politician - Professional Builder - Professional Farmer - Professional Miner - Senior Officer - Starship Bioengineer - Starship Cook - Starship Engineer - Starship Guard - Starship Nurse - Starship Pilot - Super Soldier - Veteran Marine - Video Game Blogger
-------------------------
